welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ramsey, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport provides services for both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marham RAF Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Marham RAF Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
